mapper.select: update INSBRulequeryrepeatinsured set operator = #{operator},modifytime = #{modifytime},noti = #{noti},taskid = #{taskid},inscorpid = #{inscorpid},inscorpcode = #{inscorpcode},inscorpname = #{inscorpname},policystarttime = #{policystarttime},policyendtime = #{policyendtime},policyid = #{policyid},risktype = #{risktype} where id = #{id}
SELECT i.*,i.`policyid` AS policyno FROM INSBRulequeryrepeatinsured i WHERE i.`taskid`=#{taskid}
